name: Input Text
description: This is an example of description that could be used for this kind of situations where your dont know what to say

api.description: with this property you set the style of the input
with this property you can limit the number of characters
with this property you can enable the reset button to erase the input value
choose the name of the input value field
with this property you disable the component
this is the value of the autocomplete
Callback function that is fired when the autocomplete value changes

features.description: with the GSInputText component you can choose the style that you want to give to the input field
with the GSInputText component you can choose if you want to enable the reset button so you can erase the input value
